articles.content: Salmonella is again at the center of yet another product recall. It’s a bacteria that can contaminate all sorts of products and cause potentially fatal infections in certain groups of people. This ti… [+2642 chars]

articles.title: The price of a home sold in March set a record, as inventory dwindled and sales fell - CNBC
articles.description: March sales were 4.5% lower than the same period in 2021.
